attributes.action: extend direct international rail services from London St. Pancras north to Liverpool Lime Street & Glasgow Central
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the creation of "High Speed 1" between London St. Pancras and Continental Europe. We petition the Prime Minister to set aside the necessary funds to build a new high speed rail line "High Speed 2", from London St. Pancras to the north-west of England & Scotland via. Birmingham, terminating at Liverpool Lime Street & Glasgow Central. 

This new "High Speed 2" would be linked to the European rail network, providing direct high speed rail services from Scotland & The North-West, via. Birmingham and London, to Paris, Brussels and beyond

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
